name: @capacitor-community/sqlite
description: Community plugin for native SQLite databases
author: Robin Genz <mail@robingenz.dev>

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin OTHER_CFLAGS='-DHAVE_GETHOSTUUID=0' && cd ..
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- --fix --format
scripts.docgen: npm run docgenPlugin && npm run docgenConnection && npm run docgenDBConnection
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.test: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.test:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme PluginTests -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16 Pro' OTHER_CFLAGS='-DHAVE_GETHOSTUUID=0' test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run docgen
